Case Study

Dan St. Romain

Educational Consulting

Long-term WooCommerce support engagement focused on performance, Kadence migration, and a digital content membership system for a growing individual business.

Visit live site

Challenge

What they needed

Dan Stro Main needed help improving site performance and maintainability while transitioning away from Elementor on a live WooCommerce site, and wanted to introduce gated digital content for members.

Approach

How we solved it

Provided ongoing technical support to migrate layouts from Elementor to Kadence, resolve WooCommerce layout and speed issues, and implement a WooCommerce-based digital content membership system without disrupting existing sales.

Completed

July 2024

Website

https://danstromain.com/

  • WooCommerce
  • Kadence
